title: Read-only testing
instructions:
Testing read-only file settings.

```python
with open("read-only.txt", "w") as f:
    f.write("this should fail\n")
print("Done")
```

```python
import os
print("This should also fail")
os.remove("read-only.txt")
```

```python
import os
print("This should succeed")
os.remove("read-write.txt")
```
